attributes.action: bann all commercial vehicles from the road between 12 o'clock lunchtime on a saturday and midnight sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on the continent there is no commercial vehicles allowed on the road between saturday lunchtime at 12 o'clock till midnight on sunday/monday morning

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
